post:
Howdy HostedTalk friends.

I’m happy to announce that a new limited stock shared hosting plan in Singapore is now available from SmallWeb. There are only 50 total plans available for the foreseeable future.

Why is it limited stock/limited edition?
Our standard service locations are maintained by SmallWeb and aren’t ran through reseller plans. However, while we focus on maintaining those locations a suitable reseller provider has been found to provide these particular services until we’re ready to deploy in Singapore for realsies.

Read more at our blog here:
https://smallweb.net/blog/new-limited-singapore-location/

1GB SGP
1GB NVMe
10 Domains
250GB Bandwidth
CloudLinux LVE
CL PHP Selector
IPv6 Supported
LiteSpeed
Free Softaculous
Free Let’s Encrypt

Only £5.00 per year

https://smallweb.net/portal/order/main/packages/limited/?group_id=35

SmallWeb Ltd. Company Number 12272693.
